sentence: [You find yourself in courtyard of stone statues, all which face an altar.]
[A dark-haired woman coils herself around your body. Her purple eyes are strangely inviting.]

author: unknown
sentence: Exactly what you want me to.

author: unknown
sentence: You would not have come here otherwise.

author: unknown
sentence: This place draws those whose... desire... is strong enought.

author: unknown
sentence: You longed to come here. I felt that need. This place... felt that need.

author: unknown
sentence: I am the only who understand you. That part of you which longs. That cries out.

author: unknown
sentence: You're excatly where you need to be. And exactly where you want to be.

author: spirit of temptation
sentence: I am the Spirit of Temptation I sense your desires, better than you understand them yourself.

author: spirit of temptation
sentence: Just give in. Let me take control.
[Her snakelike body tightens painfully around you. There isn't even time to struggle before vision fades to black.]
